name: The Mystery Room
description: This game is a game where you solve the puzzle problem and escape the room. When you start the game, you will be able to solve the puzzle problem and ask for reasoning ability. Unlock all secrets in 8 rooms and escape. Tense music and a mysterious background await you. Puzzles of various difficulty await you.
minimum_requirements: OS: window7 Processor: Core 2 Duo E6600 2.4 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce8800GT DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1500 MB available space Sound Card: Sound Card Additional Notes: Screen resolution 1920x1080
